sentences.en: ...an eccentric and flamboyant nobleman with a hedonistic lifestyle.
sentences.cn: …一个崇尚享乐主义的生活方式、古怪而派头十足的贵族。

sentences.en: But the survey revealed a strong hedonistic streak -- 13 percent would a glass of champagne.
sentences.cn: 同时,调查也显示了人们强烈的快乐主义倾向 —— 13%的人说他们什麽也不会做,只想喝杯香槟,等待最后时刻的到来.

sentences.en: Do something hedonistic: think afternoon at a spa or going out dancing.
sentences.cn: 做一些享受的事情: 想想下午去洗个温泉浴,或者去外面跳一支舞.

sentences.en: For one with such a hedonistic and varied private life, Xizor grew tired.
sentences.cn: 过着这种享乐而放荡不羁的私生活, 西佐感到极为劳累.

sentences.en: However hedonistic or naive they may be, children have long memories.
sentences.cn: 而面向儿童行销的公司对此需要细心应对还有个原因.

sentences.en: In hedonistic Las Vegas, six weeks is enough.
sentences.cn: 在享乐主义的拉斯维加斯, 六个星期就足够办完了.

sentences.en: Sated and miserable in hedonistic Rome, he looks to the chivalry of the knights crusader.
sentences.cn: 厌倦了快乐主义的罗马, 他向往十字军骑士精神.

sentences.en: The cookery course was serious and hedonistic at the same time.
sentences.cn: 烹饪课既是一件严肃的事又是一种享受。

sentences.en: Their philosophy being materialistic and hedonistic, they scoffed at any thoughts of the world to come.
sentences.cn: 由于他们的哲学是物质的和享乐的, 他们对于任何来世的想法都加以蔑视.
